welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming town of Clayton le Moors! Known for its beautiful countryside and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely town has to offer. Enjoy your stay in Clayton le Moors!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and executive flights at Warton Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and leisure destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a mixture of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
